Reviews.Title: “excellent value hotel”
Reviews.Author: Lucy H
Reviews.Content: good location shopping activities miami hotel great value staff makes hotel really contact staff afternoon manager customer service regular family made us feel like hotels take lesson

Reviews.Title: “excellent value hotel”
Reviews.Author: wagnerfontes2
Reviews.Content: problems hotel property room clean well kept free breakfast morning always helps many great options staff made feel welcome always greeted walked past stay im area

Reviews.Title: “Great value for money”
Reviews.Author: Johanna o
Reviews.Content: daughter college miami brings area couple times year stayed hotels closer offers better combination easy access good value area beach entertainment stayed hotel several times staff hotel capable competent friendly especially alfonso front desk

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location”
Reviews.Author: Jill R
Reviews.Content: hotel last three years every better team members fantastic ready every time day manager always aware everything available provide needs facilities always kept clean location extremely convenient breakfast good confortable rooms next vacations highly recomend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous, great value hotel!”
Reviews.Author: epicureglasgow
Reviews.Content: stayed hampton inn miami dadeland may 5 8 2010 pleased warm hospitality employees alfonso worked front desk evenings particularly pleasant helpful every way often case rooms simple service limited employees make property stand alfonso definitely one stars one long stay ends well older gentleman drove shuttle saturday evening may 8 deserves sweet downside visit shuttle one complimentary service offered first come first serve basis must possible services guests spend hour waiting arrive good trip would return would definitely plan using shuttle

Reviews.Title: “Hotel Corot, Rome - a good budget hotel”
Reviews.Author: GautamMu
Reviews.Content: 3rd time miami business hampton inn dadeland hospitality best front desk staff makes feel welcomed rest staff including managers always around greet concerned asking stay pleasant one one hotel recommend look forward next stay

Reviews.Title: “Location, Location, Location”
Reviews.Author: jangale
Reviews.Content: close airport close enough easily get miami attractions usual chain provides good quality rooms public areas clean well maintained breakfast buffet offers wide selection always restocked nice touch cookies reception evening option breakfast bag need quick getaway friendly efficient receptionists give warm welcome good impression hotel close mall lots chain restaurants plenty choice would definately stay

Reviews.Title: “good place for short stay”
Reviews.Author: dtaddeo
Reviews.Content: stayed one weekend night family trip hotel quiet set back major roads close many places could walk two malls metro rail station less 5 minutes metro rail get downtown bayside half hour without numerous stores restaurants area nice breakfast morning fresh baked cookies newspapers always available free lobby large flat screen tv room numerous movie sports channels hotel safe area miami driving north airport exit sunset drive come back way save 10 minutes miss drive traffic

Reviews.Title: “good choice for a short stay”
Reviews.Author: samreeti
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel cruise hotel kept car free two medical malls shopping every aspect stay wonderful staff could improve phone service takes several calls get hot breakfast includes fruits juices eggs pancakes yoghurt breads muffins coffee tea day free apples counter day warm cookies afternoons rooms clean house keeping staff friendly efficient would recommend get room first floor refrigerator microwave business center needs improvement printer highly recommended shopping dadeland mall

Reviews.Title: “Very convenient location”
Reviews.Author: lemondrizzle
Reviews.Content: great place stay whether traveling alone family alfonso staff made us feel welcome took care us stay making sure good breakfast rooms comfortable eat dinner fresh hot baked cookies arrived work went beyond us customers

Reviews.Title: “Great Location,”
Reviews.Author: pennyblossam
Reviews.Content: hotel opinion best managed hotel florida travel everytime stay hotel always get best nights rest everyone hotel love soft cotton bed highly recommend hotel 10 rating

Reviews.Title: “Good Budget Hotel”
Reviews.Author: 72Niki
Reviews.Content: every year cruise miami main vacation cruise amenities look hotel include low cost clean sheets transportation miami airport miami cruise port hotel requirements new hotel choice precruise post cruise stays hotel across street miami metro rail bucks ride day see things like bayside market place dadeland mall sunset mall miami zoo miami museum art etc many things name transfer cruise port airport easy room clean comfortable pool area enclosed clean plenty chairs hot tub area spent hours pool hot tub complimentary breakfast included cheese muffins bagels fresh fruit cereal coffees teas juices etc much expected go back sure already shared fellow cruise within walking distance resturant recommend

Reviews.Title: “Very good”
Reviews.Author: RosaSaoPaulo_Brazil Posted by an Accorhotels.com traveler
Reviews.Content: pros price location guys speaks good towels big room free parking cons rooms window dont open ac terrible breakfast plastic much carpet room

Reviews.Title: “I would gladly stay here again!”
Reviews.Author: GSPtravelguy
Reviews.Content: stayed hampton inn dadeland past week 1 night really impressed nice hotel south miami area great staff friendly goes way make stay one highly recommend hotel friends breakfast good plenty

Reviews.Title: “"Lovely honeymoon!"”
Reviews.Author: Tanrmc
Reviews.Content: rating hotel 35 5 looking bed sleep stay hampton without thinking except also good rooms money

Reviews.Title: “It's ok”
Reviews.Author: suguna2202
Reviews.Content: husband miami feb 24 2010 one night precruise decided stay hampton inn proximity dining shopping im glad free shuttle airport also dropped us mile hotel dinner charge charged per room take us port catch cruise huge traveling kids would recommend hotel anyone looking nice place stay cruise definately met needs

Reviews.Title: “Old Rome”
Reviews.Author: Stubbies35
Reviews.Content: stayed two nights pros hampton beds linens fitted sheets clean cover quiet location room clean maintained facility bathrooms maintained new next dadeland mall big mall etc best price cons hard find furniture used fabric chairs stained south miami going beach prepared drive

Reviews.Title: “Great location - decent hotel for the price”
Reviews.Author: JulieL0ves2Travel
Reviews.Content: needed decent place stay one night 20 min downtown near mall straight shot highway place clean fairly new hotel comfortable great breakfast great little restaurants strip malls nearby fantastic place called miss bistro street

Reviews.Title: “great location for airport shuttle”
Reviews.Author: BertienBryce
Reviews.Content: service received excellent staff asked could anything us received call room management making sure liked room room extremely nice new look overall plenty towels exercise room pool area good total experience superior chocolate cookies good also

Reviews.Title: “Good location for our needs!”
Reviews.Author: careymfm
Reviews.Content: picked hotel shopping package site included bag coupon book meal shuttle mall clerk checked us told us shuttle treated airport priority could get mall wasnt busy airport eventually able get shuttle needed turned response something specifically items package particularly next time around would pick package liked room comfortable beds lots space room included free breakfast got downstairs run everything several us guests waiting around eventually took little obvious werent paying attention

Reviews.Title: “best choice & within budget :)”
Reviews.Author: JohnnyKeh
Reviews.Content: recomend hotel staff kind room clean breakfast feel home

Reviews.Title: “Just a notch above a hostel”
Reviews.Author: LateforEverything
Reviews.Content: partner enjoyable stay clean comfortable quiet hotel could asked trip visit friends area miami also found excellent location sites areas miami breeze getting right near highway cant wait go back miami stay hampton inn

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable and location.”
Reviews.Author: Nabil d
Reviews.Content: stayed hampton inn dadeland numerous occasions since daughter goes school university miami convenient everything malls beaches restaurants university 15 minute ride away room spotless service always great throw hot breakfast 1030 nice pool hot tub always good great beds bedding

Reviews.Title: “its a great hotel !!”
Reviews.Author: ettygershon
Reviews.Content: spend 200 nights year road hotels stayed ritz hotel staff good great rates rooms large spotless good breakfast buffet always yes anyone works location works fine easy get back forth hotel staff handled every request put

Reviews.Title: “great location for first time visit to rome”
Reviews.Author: aureliusjackson
Reviews.Content: went beyond call duty accommodate us rooms neat clean roomy quiet us port responded promptly request picked upon return would definitely recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Rome”
Reviews.Author: Rhodesm
Reviews.Content: stayed one night business typical hampton inn good thing get surprises work room small everything appeared working outdoor pool hot tub looked clean closed 9 later would nicer front desk staff friendly helpful internet worked well bathroom well stocked shampoo etc two everything room 100 typical hampton inn clean comfortable didnt think worn others commented sort hard find tucked way back easy find lots places eat next mall

Reviews.Title: “Close to the main Station”
Reviews.Author: chiquibabe
Reviews.Content: stayed 6 nights month hampton inn everything pretty great rooms excellent large comfortable king paid night free parking cheap terrible nice place feel like got worth internet rooms worked pretty well use pool looked nice definitely much smaller looks website complaint fitness room kind thats important book hotel 3 pieces exercise bike ok thats free weights remote tv way reach change channel worse thing scale breakfast nice plentiful actually cereals oatmeal muffins pastries toast bagels 2 times ate hot choices waffles sausages cheese location dont know miami well hotel located right near highway 1 behind big shopping mall art supplies subway sandwich place best buy sports nearby major stores like 5th ave great comfortable stay highly recommended

Reviews.Title: “well situated for the attractions”
Reviews.Author: bobwinmill
Reviews.Content: stayed three nights hampton inn dadeland weekend overwhelming number positives hotel first staff professional friendly eager ensure stay pleasant experience room common areas clean odor cleaners beds fairly comfortable even couch slept despite full hotel guests quiet never problem noise really sounds guests problems 4th floor wireless internet service connection dropped almost soon made staff tried help may problem location building business trip would requested room closer lobby better wireless service another thing available space hampton inn website consistently told us nights hotel least one nonsmoking room two doubles available fact hotel rooms open accepted room king bed sofa staff apologetic repeated error dont fault clearly problem online reservation system one last positive negative situation wife unexpected medical emergency last night stay ensured phoned front desk even late hour phone answered within two man answered carefully got request right first time stayed calm arranged miami fire call within next 60 seconds another ten minutes crew room short order wife taken nearby hospital us excellent choice wife fine thank hampton staff dealt helpful concerned even shift changes every staff person dealt speed going us worked late checkout time needed later day course wed rather spent last night miami dadeland hampton inn night hospital room ended great service professional help time grateful

Reviews.Title: “Some good but mostly bad”
Reviews.Author: Slainte-Unadilla
Reviews.Content: overall excellent choice days miami lovely room helpful staff great free breakfast including cereals fruit pastries hot biscuits waffles sausage etc loads free parking close dadeland mall approximately half hours drive south beach difficulty finding place used driving us come 9 hour flight

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location”
Reviews.Author: ifolays
Reviews.Content: nice stay us plus points quiet clean comfortable affordable complimentary breakfast fruits fresh coffee decent quality negative points fairly close shopping malls metro access one needs car esp hotel shuttle appears little one needs car get around yes hot breakfast worth skip final comfortable stay

Reviews.Title: “Basic Hotel Has Everything You Need--Safe Quiet..Busy area stay alert”
Reviews.Author: kingfan100
Reviews.Content: hotel bit difficult locate follow directions us 1 look hotel near traffic bridge hotel fully booked travelers like attending orange bowl game cold miami dates stay needed use room heater used time room smelled never used heater adjusted hotel adequate business center special key hot tub fine pool breakfast standard fare hampton inn hotel providing brown bag go breakfast bags use always sleep rooms quiet clean bed comfortable plenty resturants food choices ample front desk staff willing assist saturday breakfast unique weekend travelers meant kids breakfast bar prepared hotel staff best try keep even though watched people step front overall quality expected hampton inn orange bowl happy tech fans stayed hotel sad

Reviews.Title: “Book this hotel ...Right price, Right location ..Thumbs up !”
Reviews.Author: John-manassas
Reviews.Content: stayed hampton inn dadeland 4 nights beginning november hotel clean free parking breakfast fairly good also business center free internet hotel close major mall location 20 min south beach 10 min coconut grove rush hours since one cannot stay miami without car quality price excellent would definitely return

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Location”
Reviews.Author: Jac48904
Reviews.Content: things worked pleased 2 return stays hampton month previous stay staff kind hotel expect hampton clean quiet comfortable spacious free breakfast good free breakfast want something better restaurant half mile south us 1 pretty good pool area clean hot tub available well one stay inroom movies working wasnt sure remote control wasnt really interested much either cleaning staff good like hampton love free wifi since convenient getting work done stayed king sofa room unlike stay last december small fridge ask room one need one youre shopping theres dadeland mall quarter mile away across street shopping center best buy sports bed bath beyond remember previous review youre miami hotel may little difficult find signs us 1 past dadeland north station heading south miss turns call hotel directions also hampton free parking however hotel popular parking lot quickly spaces rear well lit night bed best excellent comforter duvet spare pillow blanket closet wife picky due bad back loves beds may said previous review hilton conrad think even though hampton full service hotel may well better value expensive

Reviews.Title: “Do not recommend this hotel”
Reviews.Author: Elise123
Reviews.Content: stayed hampton inn miami dadeland one night june 2007 room spacious bed enormous although room generally clean drop behind one bedside didnt appreciate finding old used tried hotel conveniently located miami dadeland mall hotel staff extremely helpful happy offer assistance could breakfast okay little crowded popular id recommend hotel dont go looking behind furniture

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful, Great Location, and Very Spacious!”
Reviews.Author: no1010
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel november 2006 went wife 3 years old son week highlights 1 shopping hotel middle dadeland mall dadeland station mall walking distance 2 terrific places shop also one block find many malls like park 2 great one night stand complimentary shuttle takes airport 2 miles around hotel 3 extremely well located rooms quiet beds great rest sure 4 complimentary breakfast ok nothing spectacular enough start day good coffee though serve biscuits afternoon 5 rooms well sized clean small fridge microwave really convenient free self park 6 staff friendly gave every morning bottled water son consider nice touch tip wont see hotel look small sign right going south dadeland station mall turn right

Reviews.Title: “Watch out for recommended tour lines and promises”
Reviews.Author: AlmostFamousRocker
Reviews.Content: recently stayed 5 days rooms super clean staff friendly helpful loved fact room microwave refrigerator free breakfast added bonus allowed keep contact office easy use would definately stay

Reviews.Title: “Small Rooms: Good for Rome”
Reviews.Author: Morphi
Reviews.Content: great room ceiling plus spa bath bathroom good breakfasts staff make great cappucino dont want machine coffee great location 2 minutes termini station also great value local restaurants staff friendly cant fault stay would use

Reviews.AuthorLocation: 1/2 way between Seattle and Vancouver BC
Reviews.Title: “Vive Italia, Vive Roma, Vive Hotel Corot!”
Reviews.Author: a_way_gone_cat
Reviews.Content: clean comfortable room good breakfast excellent location walking termini station trains buses buses subway everywhere although window fancy places around quite convenient stay staff extremely helpful polite friendly efficient noise level room quite low totally disagree previous comment complaining hotel gave best value money spent

Reviews.Title: “Great location”
Reviews.Author: UKtraveller71
Reviews.Content: room nothing special clean reasonably comfortable bathroom really nice complaints breakfast theyll make proper cappuccino dont fancy coffee machine staff quite friendly complaints bed bit hard tv located high channels english comes rome sleep watch area isnt great sightseeing quite handy transport people guide books claim area gets bit dodgy dark didnt feel unsafe threatened stay

Reviews.Title: “Good location”
Reviews.Author: DTNJLAW
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel twice location second none termini fact see entrance hotel door small criticism would rooms however spotlessly clean staff whether reception waiting cleaning helpful friendly breakfasts varied plentiful fact hotel would take price location cleanliness

Reviews.Title: “Great Location - Nice Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Giltedge
Reviews.Content: chose hotel proximity termini buses airports stop considering central position nonetheless quiet due great double glazing staff friendly polite breakfast basic plentiful waitress even offered guests cappucino espresso coffees machine hotel clean bathroom looked though yesterday ideal position main train tram bus metro routes huge variety restaurants doorstep da particularly fine would recommend great value hotel anyone review amazing checking breakfast wife could believe rude reception staff trying get away without paying national tax whole 2 euros dont believe anything posted obviously travellers

Reviews.Title: “Nice location, poor rooms”
Reviews.Author: Cabila77
Reviews.Content: great ice fancy wifi

Reviews.Title: “When in Rome”
Reviews.Author: helenmack68
Reviews.Content: right across road termini station look via exit took leonardo express train airport worth money first think letting concierge desk friendly price reasonable accommodation better expected breakfast room bright lots choices take subway system many attractions sure good walking shoes watch train station ask money helping get subway tickets machine outside hotel times selling walk purpose really good place stay days rome sure new free rome tour first night

Reviews.Title: “Excellent value and location”
Reviews.Author: steveandian
Reviews.Content: close termini station find market pharmacy stores phone companies etc always felt safe area hotel staff helpful friendly rooms little small functional clean clean bathroom pretty good breakfast best cappucino ever

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel with All The Basics”
Reviews.Author: gardnerma
Reviews.Content: stay overnight boarding flight rome next morning conveniently located termini 3 mins away room surprisingly spacious given location hotel airconditioning also excellent helpful suggesting best way travel airport otherwise doubt would caught flight time breakfast good considering price paid good choice overall short stay

Reviews.Title: “Hotel Corot is convenient but very basic”

Reviews.Content: stayed hotel november wanted pass tips convenient terms train around town get area bit like cross people homeless see side rome around location lots benefits good food outlets food coffee supermarket nearby tourist buses transport also close getting home much less hassle hotel joined hotel walk lobby get lift carpet staircase well worn doesnt look great room clean walls stained people mentioned breakfast fine better one day next one day lots choice cakes another croissants things course advise try orange juice machine mixed juice cappucino machine nice staff mixed staff within hotel lovely one receptionist also nice couple reception staff quite warm tv make sure use menu function control numbers get 4 channels use menu function get etc english speaking mainly news finding hotel easy know exit station large exit see mcdonalds turn around look opposite way see another large exit get close look see sign saying via correct road exit road opposite via hotel yards right road find spa supermarket near hotel exit hotel road turn walk left see covered walkway across road supermarket 100 yards obvious one big tourist bus routes near hotel forgotten name tend use cities keep ticket get 10 discount next city always forget keep ticket exit hotel turn right stop 20 yards station side run 2 routes one goes stop feeling winter run one route days although advertised tell buy ticket either route running think route goes close hotel starts 30 60 mins check hotel think suitable budget travellers expectations

Reviews.Title: “lovely hotel”
Reviews.Author: ciarak81
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel corot two nights close termini station parts hotel better beds bathroom clean let wallpaper dont know rooms unlucky reception staff friendly buffet breakfast good taken clean modern area reasonable price room shame shabby areas

Reviews.Title: “average”
Reviews.Author: dabWigan
Reviews.Content: first went hotel awful start looking hotel nearby termini station found hotel guy fair price breakfast air conditioning wireless also could save luggages check room good less one block termini station perfect

Reviews.Title: “Ideal location”
Reviews.Author: mrcookes
Reviews.Content: main thing look hotel clean hotel corot certainly couldnt cleanliness sheets towels changed everyday room wasnt ready arrived early returned hotel 20 minutes later room ready bags even taken us room wasnt large means enough space us spread pleasantly surprised bathroom good size newly decorated even bidet jacuzzi bath lift tiny fits 2 people bags minor criticism wouldnt place upmarket hotel breakfast standard continental regularly restocked make fresh coffee ask rather using vending machine location good 1 minute walk termini means get ideal getting train airport using metro turn right hotel 3 nice restaurants along street although isnt much else around worth going restaurants side streets side termini staff helpful directions gave us choice rooms although didnt problems im sure would handled well anyone hotel seems ridiculous expectations paying low price anyway good option would recommend

Reviews.Title: “Almost couldn't fault it!”
Reviews.Author: rosie_rosa
Reviews.Content: finished cruise traveled rome train termini station block away sat hotel corot meant metro trains right easy room quiet street away station staff extremely helpful friendly room easy get charming older elevator housekeeper helpful us kept us well stocked things bathroom breakfast everything european breakfast breads meat cheese coffee juice wireless internet fast reliable ever find rome book corot

Reviews.Title: “Great Little Hotel”
Reviews.Author: deezoomo
Reviews.Content: stayed june 21 24 couldnt asked better location – 2 minutes walk termini train station buses metro location important us especially late train coming florence one nights didnt want walk long distance almost 11 night hearing many stories pickpockets rome pleasantly surprised place around termini still bustling tourists night probably summer longer daylight lots places around eat buy water snacks within termini station several eateries huge newspaper shopping mall basement around corot many small restaurants serving reasonably priced meals meal ristorante steps away corot soup pasta main course chicken choice salad choice dessert coffee ordered meal hotel service corot really great arrived 9 morning sure early checkin prepared wait around room us happy immediately checkin hassle free less 5 minutes shown room practically lady name super strong grabbed 2 huge heavy luggage tiny lift ran 3 floors help us haul bags room amazed speed also positive smiling attitude great welcome later also saw housekeeping well helping breakfast room everywhere always great smile made huge difference stay sorry forgot take name also extremely nice us allowing us start breakfast early 6 usually opened breakfast 7 breakfast wonderful checking hotel touring italy large tour group stayed 6 different hotels international hotel chains none breakfasts came close 2 kinds cold cuts cheese pastries toast selection jam fruit cocktail cereal juice tea selection coffee machine expresso reason freshly served everything free thing didnt eggs okay us much anyway earlier room simple sufficient space place 2 huge luggage plus shopping bags simple wardrobe plentiful supply hangers safe deposit box provided morning call using phone room convenient didnt require calling reception every night limited number tv channels appeared italian didnt really matter us reached back quite late every night went bed toiletries provided gel soaps toothbrush box seemed rare thing earlier hotels provide also large bath towels hand towels separate towels bidet housekeeping good thanks clean thorough thing didnt particularly like aircon kept turned day returned early evening would return room thats cool request reception got turned immediately though guess quite good thing actually great friendly safe place stay rome great value tip heavy trolley luggage better enter hotel entrance next door corot steps leading reception entrance doesnt steps 2 hotels sort joined every way share lift friend watch bags hop corot reception next door check pass reception head lift room

Reviews.Title: “So-so”
Reviews.Author: greve
Reviews.Content: hotel convenient location one street away train station able catch metro conveniently come main train station able take train airport end stay would suggest taking overnight train buying tickets line seats sold 3 different set people ended standing one help us hotel great offered buffet breakfast cold cuts bread pastries cereal juices many espresso could drink great mornings go look breakfast going sites rooms average size europe high ceilings ample bathroom staff definitely helpful suggesting routes sites would definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Almost next to the train station”
Reviews.Author: JKWD
Reviews.Content: close termini train station sure exit station doors marked via exit station theres mcdonalds across street went wrong doors room clean mattresses firm thats okay us bathrooms recently remodeled floor calling downstairs airconditioning turned little odd whenever called immediately started breakfast good especially cappuccino

Reviews.Title: “A little gem”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel corot 4 nights rome 2010 close train station relatively low prices actually expect much – pleasantly surprised room located second floor window facing small street outside despite quiet time barely heard anything guests best thing room bathroom fresh looked newly renovated rest room didn’t really feeling well kept said hotel areas reception dining room nothing exceptional also nothing complain wouldnt use elevator building though stopped working stay staff nice helpful made stay really great
